#!/usr/bin/env python# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-'''@File  : train.py@Author: 林谋乐@Date  : 2020/8/26 12:08'''import torchimport torch.nn as nnfrom segmentation_hrrs.unet_model import UNetfrom segmentation_hrrs.load_image import getImageimport torch.optim as optimfrom torch.utils.data import DataLoaderimport warnings# import setproctitleimport numpy as np# setproctitle.setproctitle("Super")import argparsewarnings.filterwarnings('ignore')from torchvision import transforms# from torch.optim.lr_scheduler import StepLR# import osimport mathimport configparser as cpfrom metrics import AverageMeter,Evaluator'''get init parameter from config.ini or input from console'''trans_label = transforms.Compose([    transforms.ToPILImage(),    transforms.CenterCrop((2452,2610)),    transforms.ToTensor(),])# inifile = cp.ConfigParser()# filename = "config/config.ini"# inifile.read(filename,"UTF-8")parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="this is chebynet_unet")parser.add_argument("--epochs",type=int,default=200)parser.add_argument("--lr",type=float,default=0.0005)parser.add_argument("--gpu_ids",type=int,default=1)parser.add_argument("--random-seed",type=int,default=1)
